detail_desc: STUDIO COLLECTION. Boxy-style, cropped polo shirt in piqué made from a cotton blend with a ribbed collar and button placket. Dropped shoulders, short, wide sleeves and a round cut-out at the back with ties at the hem. Straight-cut hem.
Shorts in printed sweatshirt fabric with wide elastication and a drawstring at the waist, side pockets and a back pocket. Soft brushed inside.
3/4-length leggings in soft, organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.

Jacket in woven fabric with a slight sheen. Jersey-lined hood with a small collar and drawstring, a zip down the front, side pockets and a mesh inner pocket, all with a hook and loop fastening. Narrow trims at the cuffs and a drawstring at the hem. Jersey lining.
Long-sleeved top in soft jersey with a draped knot detail at the hem.
LOVE STORIES x H&M. Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist, frill trim at the top and cutaway coverage at the back.
Jersey T-shirt in a cotton and modal blend with embroidered text at the neckline.

Calf-length dress in woven fabric. Wide fit with an opening and covered button at the back of the neck and short puff sleeves with narrow cuffs. Seam at the waist and a flared skirt with a flounce at the hem.

Padded jacket in woven fabric with a fleece-lined drawstring hood and zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front. Side pockets with a hook and loop fastening, flap front pockets with a press-stud and a side pocket on the outside, and one inner pocket with a press-stud. Adjustable tab with a hook and loop fastening at the cuffs. Quilted lining. Polyester filling.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a motif in a relaxed fit with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Sports top in sturdier jersey with a mesh-lined, drawstring hood and zip at the top. Ventilating holes under the arms, a kangaroo pocket with a zip at the sides, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft, lightly brushed inside.
Joggers in stretch supersoft denim with a ribbed elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, front and back pockets and elasticated hems.
Jumper in a soft knit with dropped shoulders and wide sleeves.
Sandals in snakeskin-patterned leather with an adjustable ankle strap that has a metal buckle. Leather insoles. Heel approx. 8 cm.
Wide elastic waist belt with a large metal buckle and hook-and-eye fastening. Width 5.5 cm.
Padded jacket in woven fabric with a detachable, pile-lined hood with a faux fur trim and stand-up collar. Zip down the front, side pockets with press-studs and a detachable belt at the waist. Lined.
Soft, non-wired bras in microfibre with mesh-lined cups that give the bust a natural shape and light support. Adjustable shoulder straps. No fasteners.
Three thin metal chain necklaces in different designs, two with a pendant. Adjustable length from 38-44 cm to 86-92 cm.

High-waisted sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with jacquard-patterned details. Wide, elasticated panel to hold in and shape the waist and sculpting seams at the back to showcase the body’s physique. The tights are designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.
Wide, straight-cut T-shirt in cotton jersey with a yoke front and back, short sleeves with printed stripes, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Long cardigan in washed cotton jersey with a hood and draped lapels. Welt side pockets, no fasteners and raw edges.
Joggers in jersey made from a cotton blend with an elasticated drawstring waist, decorative buttons at the front, side pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
All-in-one suit in soft fleece with a print motif, jersey-lined hood and contrasting colour zip down the front. Side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hems.
Shorter, fitted top in ribbed jersey with a round neckline, short sleeves and cut-out section over one shoulder.
Sleeveless dress in organic cotton jersey with a seam at the waist and bell-shaped skirt. Unlined.
Fitted top in stretch jersey with a round neck and long sleeves.
Fitted coat in woven fabric with a tuxedo-style collar, jetted front pockets, detachable tie belt at the waist, a slit at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.
Double-layered tube scarf knitted in soft merino wool with a twisted detail at the front.
Push-up bra in lace and mesh with underwired, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Body in soft, ribbed velour with a deep V-neck, narrow shoulder straps and a lined gusset with press-studs.
Jacket in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a hood, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Jumper in a soft rib knit containing some wool with a turtle neck, low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and slits in the sides.

All-in-one suit in soft pile. Hood with appliqués, a zip down the front with a chin guard, and ribbing at the cuffs and hems. Inset band at the waist in a contrasting colour with an appliqué at the front.
Cotton hairbands with a bow at the front and covered elastic at the back.

Padded parka in satin with a detachable, pile-lined hood with a faux fur trim. Stand-up collar, zip down the front with a chin guard, welt side pockets and narrow elastication at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Fitted top in ribbed jersey with a round neck and long, raglan sleeves.
Straight-cut jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels and flap welt front pockets. Lined.
Jumper in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with buttons on one shoulder, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Knee-length skirt in airy, pleated chiffon. Regular waist with covered elastication. Lined.

Push-up bra in lace and mesh with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Lace racer back, narrow adjustable shoulder straps, a wide mesh strap at the back and metal fastener at the front.
Short skirt in bouclé made from a cotton blend. Concealed zip in one side with a hook-and-eye fastening at the top and fake front pockets with a decorative flap. Lined.

Calf-length dress in a cotton weave with embroidery. Opening at the top, 3/4-length balloon sleeves and a seam at the waist with pleats for added width. Concealed zip in one side and a flared skirt with an asymmetric hem. Lined.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and slits in the sides.

Shirt in a cotton weave with a button-down collar, classic front and yoke at the back. Open chest pocket, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a mid waist, ties at the sides and medium coverage at the back.
Brazilian briefs in microfibre and lace with a low waist, lined gusset and half-string back.
Bodysuits in soft jersey with decorative picot trims, short puff sleeves, an opening and button at the back of the neck and press-studs at the crotch.
T-shirts in soft, organic cotton jersey.
Top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with long raglan sleeves and a wrapover, jersey-lined funnel collar with a drawstring. Kangaroo pocket, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with jacquard-patterned details. High waist with wide, elasticated ribbing. The tights are designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.
Cargo trousers in a cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist and fake fly. Side pockets, flap leg pockets, flap back pockets and legs that can be rolled up with a tab and press-stud.
Glittery bow tie with matching handkerchief. Bow tie with an adjustable strap and fastening at the back. Width 10.5 cm. Size of handkerchief 32x32 cm.
Straight-cut denim jacket with a collar, buttons down the front and flap chest pockets. Embroidered text motif on the back, dropped shoulders, buttoned cuffs and a frayed raw-edge hem.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket, small embroidery detail on the chest and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Hat in a soft rib knit containing some wool.
5-pocket jeans in washed, stretch denim with hard-worn details. Regular waist, a zip fly and button, and skinny legs.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline.
Long-sleeved nightdress in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front, round neck and decorative bow at the neckline.
Knee-high boots in imitation leather with a shaft in supple imitation suede. Satin linings, imitation leather insoles and smooth soles. Heel 9.5 cm.
Short-sleeved off-the-shoulder top in soft jersey.
Trousers in stretch twill with detachable braces. Adjustable elasticated waist with a press-stud, side pockets and fake back pockets. Adjustable, elastic braces with imitation leather details.
Wide skirt in double-layered tulle with a glittery finish and covered elastication at the waist. Lined.

KAROLINA KIJAK x H&M. Dress in a soft, patterned modal and cotton weave with a square neckline, flutter sleeves and buttons down the front. Gathered seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.

Dungaree shorts in an airy organic cotton weave with buttons at the top and frill-trimmed straps that cross at the back. Elasticated seam at the back of the waist and a lined lower section. Narrow elastication and a frill trim around the hems, and press-studs at the crotch.
Bikini briefs in cotton and lace with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and medium coverage at the back.
Trousers in soft leather with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and side and back pockets. Legs with decorative seams and raw-edge hems. Viscose twill lining at the top.
Jumper in a soft rib knit containing some wool with a polo neck, low dropped shoulders and long, wide sleeves.
Jacquard-knit socks in various colours and designs.

Jacket in windproof, water-repellent, breathable fabric with a rounded collar and detachable, lined hood. Zip down the front with a chin guard, flap patch pockets with a press-stud at the front, and ribbing at the cuffs. Lined.
Long T-shirt in soft jersey made from a cotton blend with short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Fitted vest top in soft, ribbed fabric with a deep neckline at the front and decorative buttons at the top.
Long-sleeved cardigan in a soft, loose knit with no buttons. The polyester content of the cardigan is recycled.
Round-necked T-shirt in soft jersey.
Derby shoes in imitation suede with decorative welt seams and open lacing at the front. Fabric linings and insoles. Heel approx. 2.5 cm.
V-neck top in soft slub jersey with short sleeves, a seam centre back and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Short, straight-cut dress in jersey with a contrasting colour trim around the neckline and sleeves. Unlined.
Boxer shorts in organic cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low, V-shaped waist and cutaway coverage at the back.
Leggings in soft, ribbed organic cotton jersey with rippled, overlocked edges at the hems. One pair with a frill at the back and one pair with an all-over print.
